title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.26 - Applications for permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.26 - Applications for permits

State Regulations

Applications for all permits, renewals thereof, and all
permits themselves, shall be made and granted upon forms therefor approved and
adopted by the board. Applications for permit renewals must be filed by March
15th. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
